FuncDef:
The anti-attack icmp-flood car command sets the rate limit of ICMP flood attack packets.
The undo anti-attack icmp-flood car command restores the default rate limit of ICMP flood attack packets. The anti-attack icmp-flood car command sets the rate limit of ICMP flood attack packets. The undo anti-attack icmp-flood car command restores the default rate limit of ICMP flood attack packets. By default, the rate limit of ICMP flood attack packets is 155000000 bit/s.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the CIR.
Integer type. Range: 8000-155000000. The default value is 155000000, in bit/s.
